name: .JRS File Extension
summary: Learn about .JRS files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Transaction log file created by Microsoft Exchange, a popular messaging and collaboration program; serves as a placeholder for a transaction and is saved in the Exchange queue database.

content: NOTE: JRS files are only created when the hard disk that contains the transaction log runs out of space. They are used stop the queue database cleanly.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
